pages.text: Elemental fusion represents the pinnacle of magical achievement - the ability to combine multiple elements into devastating new spell forms.

§6Fire + Water = Steam§r
§bWater + Air = Mist§r
§cFire + Earth = Lava§r
§aEarth + Air = Dust Storm§r
The Fusion Focus allows precise control over elemental energies, preventing catastrophic magical feedback.
Master elemental fusion by practicing with small amounts of energy first. The consequences of failure can be... explosive.
